SELECT a.questionSeq ,a.content ,a.writetime ,a.language_select ,b.user_level ,b.user_id
FROM question a LEFT JOIN airLanguage_member b ON b.memberSeq = a.userID WHERE 1=1
AND a.language_select = 9 AND a.language_select = 10 AND a.language_select = 11 AND a.language_select = 12
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 9 AND a.language_select = 10 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 11 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 12
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{navShValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 9 AND a.language_select = 10 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{navShValue},'%') AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{navShValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 11 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{navShValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 12
ORDER BY a.writetime DESC

SELECT a.questionSeq ,a.content ,a.writetime ,a.language_select ,b.user_id ,b.user_level FROM question a LEFT JOIN airLanguage_member b ON b.memberSeq = a.userID WHERE 1=1 AND a.questionSeq = #{questionSeq}

SELECT a.ansSeq ,a.ansWriteTime ,a.ansUserId ,a.ansContent ,a.ansQuestionSeq ,a.ansSelect ,c.user_id ,d.likeSeq ,d.likeUseNy FROM answer a LEFT JOIN question b ON b.questionSeq = a.ansQuestionSeq LEFT JOIN airLanguage_member c ON a.ansUserId = c.memberSeq LEFT JOIN answer_like d ON a.ansSeq = d.likeAnswerSeq WHERE 1=1 and a.ansQuestionSeq= #{questionSeq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question a WHERE 1=1
AND a.language_select = 9 AND a.language_select = 10 AND a.language_select = 11 AND a.language_select = 12
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 9 AND a.language_select = 10 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 11 AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.language_select = 12
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM answer_like WHERE 1=1 and likeAnswerSeq = #{likeAnswerSeq} and likeUserId = #{likeUserId}
mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET ansSelect = 1 WHERE ansSeq = #{ansSeq}
